synthesis_method: The electrolyte synthesis process involved mixing lithium sulfide, diphosphorus pentasulfide, and germanium sulfide in a glove box under argon, milling the mixture in a planetary ball mill with ZrO2 balls for 40 hours to obtain an amorphous ion conductive material, followed by vacuum-sealing and heat treatment to produce sulfide solid electrolyte particles with a composition of Li3.35Ge0.35P0.65S4 (glass ceramic).
